remarks: Krippenlemma (German for crib's lemma) Lemma 7.22 of [Schwabhauser] p. 53. proven by Gupta 1965 as Theorem 3.45 (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Aug-2019.)
statement:
mirval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
mirval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
mirval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
mirval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
mirval.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
mirval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
krippen.m $e |- M = ( S ` X ) $.
krippen.n $e |- N = ( S ` Y ) $.
krippen.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
krippen.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
krippen.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
krippen.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. P ) $.
krippen.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. P ) $.
krippen.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
krippen.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
krippen.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( A I E ) ) $.
krippen.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( B I F ) ) $.
krippen.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( C .- A ) = ( C .- B ) ) $.
krippen.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( C .- E ) = ( C .- F ) ) $.
krippen.5 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( M ` A ) ) $.
krippen.6 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( N ` E ) ) $.
krippen $p |- ( ph -> C e. ( X I Y ) ) $.
